TextView.android:text: Pay attention to the tense of clues. If a definition terminates in –ing or –ed, or is a plural, the solution should usually take the same form.

Think about different ways each word in the clue can be interpreted. 'Spanner' could refer to a tool or a to bridge. 'Layer' could refer to a rock, but could also be describing a bird which lays eggs. 'Tower' is a type of building but also a car pulling a trailer
In advanced cryptic crosswords the clues may make use of multiple devices.
